item.title: Felix Sexism Survey
item.author: Marie-Laure Hicks,Silvia Araguas Rodriguez,Philip Kent,Jonathan Kim,Matthew N Colvin,
item.description: Over the past year, 10 articles and 231 comments have been written about sexism in science and at Imperial. Stephen Smith’s “Sexism at Imperial College” has been viewed over 7,500 times on the Felix website. Sexism is clearly an issue that concerns the Imperial community and 631 of you gave us your …

item.title: Improve your digital photos with Photosoc: The Rule Of Thirds
item.author: Jonathan Kim,Photographic Society,
item.description: Perhaps the most well known principle of photographic composition is the “Rule of Thirds”. It is one of the most basic tools that can be used to create balanced and visually appealing shots. However, before we get into it I must warn you that rules are meant to be broken and ignoring this one does …
